content.title: MidSouth Worship Life Conference 2004
content.heading: Mid-South Worship Life Conference 2004

row.data: Art Murillo, Holland Davis, Allen Rigg
Art Murillo, Sunday Drivers, Holland Davis, David Reynolds
$65 if received on or before Feb 20
$60 Group rate (for groups of 10 or more and received before Feb 20)

content.p: Registration fee is per person for all or part of the conference. Cost includes conference materials, resource cd, t-shirt, two continental breakfasts and one lunch. Hotels, dinners and conference tapes will not be included.
Or print out this online registration form in Adobe PDF format.
To obtain the free Adobe Acrobat Reader, visit the Adobe Web Site .
There are a number of hotels within a few miles of Calvary Austin.
A few of the local choices can be found on our Around Town Web Page.
